participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sociable, enjoys engaging with others and participating in group activities.
participant_1.background: my favourite food is shawarma. i am in the army. i live in canada. i did not graduate high school. my grandfather served in world war a.

participant_2.name: Jamie Lee
participant_2.personality: Creative and a bit reserved, loves music and enjoys immersive experiences like roleplaying.
participant_2.background: my favorite band is the insane clown posse. i play a lot of call of duty. i drive a ford pinto. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events.

content.text:
I am little bit shy☺️ 
Tell me about yourself!
I am a retired military. Are you in the army?
I am a military brat, but i am a military brat, but i am a military brat. Do you live in canada?
i do live actions in roleplaying
I wear a lot of wear in leather since i am a military brat.
